name: serviceworker-webpack-plugin
description: Simplifies creation of a service worker to serve your webpack bundles

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.release:major: npm run version && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update changelog' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run version && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update changelog' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run version && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update changelog' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: Olivier Tassinari <olivier.tassinari@gmail.com> (https://github.com/oliviertassinari)
